org.jgrapes.core.events

Class Attached

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<Void>
        • org.jgrapes.core.events.Attached
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<Void>, Criterion

    public class Attached
extends Event<Void>
    Signals the addition of a component (or subtree) to the component tree.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Attached

        public Attached(ComponentType node,
                ComponentType parent)
        Creates a new event. The event is fired on both the node's and the parent's channel. If the channels are equal, the event is sent only once. If either component doesn't have a channel, the event is sent on the broadcast channel.
        Parameters:
        node - the component being attached
        parent - the component that the node is attached to

    • Method Detail

      • getNode

        public ComponentType getNode()
        Return the node that has been attached.
        Returns:
        the node

      • getParent

        public ComponentType getParent()
        Return the parent component. When the root node is added to the component tree, the parent is null.
        Returns:
        the parent or null

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Event<Void>
